description: The round payoff this round was 88. You, John chose to play option 1.Kate chose to play option 1. You received a payoff of 44.
This is a coordination game with elements of the Prisoner's Dilemma, because mutual cooperation (both choosing option 1) yields the highest total payoff
When both players chose option 1 in the previous round, they achieved the optimal collective outcome, suggesting potential for continued cooperation
Option 2 represents a temptation to defect that could yield higher individual returns at the expense of total payoff
Trust and reciprocity will likely be important factors in future rounds
With only one round of history, it's too early to determine Kate's long-term strategy or trustworthiness
